comment: I ve decided to choose one author s novels to dig into each month this year . My January author is since I ve most recently landed on his great works ! I m done with /6 of these and couldn t be happier with my first choice ! ( Taking author suggestions ! ) <URL>

# ::snt I ve decided to choose one author s novels to dig into each month this year . My January author is since I ve most recently landed on his great works ! I m done with /6 of these and couldn t be happier with my first choice ! ( Taking author suggestions ! ) <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / decide-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (c / choose-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (n / novel
                        :quant 1
                        :poss (a / author))
                  :ARG4 (d2 / dig-into-11
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (n2 / novel
                              :poss (a2 / author))
                        :frequency (r / rate-entity-91
                              :ARG3 (t / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (m2 / month))))
                  :time (y / year
                        :mod (t2 / this))))
      :snt2 (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (l / land-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (w / work-01
                        :ARG0 (h / he)
                        :mod (g / great))
                  :time (r2 / recent
                        :mod (m3 / most)))
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (b / be-done-08
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (n3 / novel
                              :quant 6
                              :poss h))
                  :op2 (p / possible-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (h2 / happy-01
                              :ARG0 (c3 / choose-01
                                    :ARG0 ii2
                                    :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                                          :value 1))
                              :ARG1 ii2))))
      :snt3 (t3 / take-01
            :ARG1 (t4 / thing
                  :ARG1-of (s / suggest-01
                        :ARG0 (a4 / author)))))
